Name: Memory Novel - The SPA
About the game: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young woman at a SPA, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the words on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image. All words are sexual themed. Features: 12 different adult images to reveal. Cards are shuffled randomly at each game, for maximum replay value. Timer, to see how long it takes to solve a puzzle Gallery where you can view all the puzzle images you have solved. Relaxing music. Be among the fastest players to achieve a top spot in our Leaderboards and unlock various achievements.
